items.sentence: Tom wasn't interested in girls at all until he was in his late teens.
If we'd known earlier that you needed help, we would've come earlier.
Tom told me that he was planning to go on a cycling trip next summer.
Mary put a note in Tom's lunchbox to tell him how much she loved him.
Tom and Mary kept their voices down so their neighbors wouldn't hear.
Tom asked Mary if John was planning on staying in Boston a long time.
I think that Tom probably isn't as good at French as you think he is.
I thought that you said we weren't going to go to Australia with Tom.
How long did it take Tom to sell his farm once he decided to sell it?
Tom didn't marry the woman we all thought that he was going to marry.
